backend/main.mo: Defines core backend actor with access control, Stripe mixins, storage, user profiles, listings, bookings, and related types and modules.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files such as pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file with SEO metadata, social tags, favicon, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Application root configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, query client, and all main page components.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityCoun: Displays live availability counts for multiple property types with loading skeletons and animated cards.
frontend/src/components/AvailabilityModa: Empty or missing content; no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/BookingSteps.tsx: Renders a three‑step animated booking guide with icons and styling based on listing category.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Empty or missing content; no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/ExploreSection.t: Empty or missing content; no implementation provided.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedListings: Fetches featured listings and renders ListingCard components with variant cycling and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Displays a multi‑column footer with branding, links, contact info, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Fixed top navigation bar handling login/logout, navigation, and role‑aware options like admin and property pages.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Empty or missing content; no implementation provided.
Renders an interactive India map with animated city markers showing active and coming‑soon locations.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Wraps the app with Header, Footer, routed content, and conditionally shows the profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx: Renders a styled listing card with rating, availability, category icons, and navigation to details.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard3D.ts: Displays a 3D‑animated listing card with hover effects, rating, availability, and category icons.
frontend/src/components/ListingDetailMod: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/MapSection.tsx: Shows an animated map section with marker pins, floating badges, and event marker tooltips.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Provides a modal form for users to create or update their profile and saves data via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/PropertyStatusBa: Displays a badge showing property availability status with corresponding icon and styling.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Handles listing reviews, allowing users to submit ratings and comments and displaying existing reviews.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: Renders interactive or static star-based rating UI with configurable size and max rating.
frontend/src/components/TestimonialBubbl: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks that wrap backend actor calls for profiles, listings, events, reviews, and related data operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining OKLCH theme variables, animations, and font settings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx: Static About Us page displaying company info, registration details, and leadership profiles with styled UI sections.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page fetching admin data, managing submissions, notifications, charges, and quick publish actions.
frontend/src/pages/BookingPolicyPage.tsx: Displays booking policies and terms with sections for disclaimers, disputes, payments, cancellations, and guidelines inside a styled scrollable layout.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryWorldPage.tsx: Shows a grid of accommodation categories with images and animations, allowing users to navigate to filtered listings.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with animated category cards, stay types, lazy‑loaded map and availability components, and navigation to listings.
frontend/src/pages/ListingPage.tsx: Provides a listings browser with category filtering, lazy‑loaded cards and map, and dynamic data loading based on selected category.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Displays privacy policy content outlining data handling, user privacy commitments, and information practices in a scrollable UI.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile page allowing viewing and editing of personal info, with save and logout actions tied to Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyManagementPag: Management interface for owners to create, edit, and update their property listings with dialogs and form handling.
frontend/src/pages/PublicPropertySubmiss: Public form for submitting new property listings with validation, image upload, and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/RefundPolicyPage.tsx: Static page displaying the refund policy details with styled sections and scrollable content.
frontend/src/pages/TermsConditionsPage.t: Static terms and conditions page outlining platform disclaimers and usage rules in a styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/UnlockPage.tsx: React page that loads a listing, handles login check, and lets users unlock and view contact details with actions like download, call, and WhatsApp.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback and hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom colors, shadows, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current scope, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions.
